parameters: "What's wrong Saku, do you know this place?"\n<Yukine>\F[5]\AA[F]\FF[22]
"This mark on the pillar, I made it on my birthday."\n<Saku>\FF[40]
"Really, there's a scar left... Let's investigate a little."\n<Yukine>\F[5]\AA[F]\FF[40]
"There should only be clothes in there."\n<Saku>\F[1]\AA[FF]\FF[22]

"Why do you know what's inside... Ah, right. You know
because it's Saku's room."\n<Yukine>\F[1]\AA[F]\FF[22]

"There's a letter inside... It's amazing it's remained so
clean."\n<Yukine>\F[5]

Saku, we cannot ask for your forgiveness for sending you to
the mountain. Tonight, we were unable to protect you. We
have never forgotten the happiness of the day you were born,
not even for a single day, and the precious memories of that
day.

We have sullied our duty. You, who were sent to the gods,
will likely never lay eyes on this letter of repentance.
Nevertheless, we leave behind this final letter.

You brought us happiness, yet we deeply regret that we
betrayed it.

Therefore, before you reach the presence of the gods, as a
samurai who could not even protect his own child, and as his
wife bearing the sin and responsibility of infanticide, we
will take our lives and become spirits to join you, along
with Lord Kageno.

Saku, we love you from the bottom of our hearts. We're sorry
we couldn't make you happy...

"Both of them had passed away before the mansion was
consumed by the curse. That's why... they didn't become evil
spirits."\n<Yukine>\F[1]\AA[F]\FF[23]
"It's okay... It's okay to cry when you're sad."\n<Yukine>\F[7]\AA[F]\FF[23]

\F[1](She's still sad... But she can say she's okay. Even though
she's been sealed away for so long... Saku really is a
strong girl.)\AA[F]\FF[41]

(From the red comb in hand emanates Saku's aura and the
gentle power of prayers. Could this be the sole keepsake
left by her mother?)\FF[22]\F[5]\AA[N]
"This belongs to Saku... I want you to use it."\n<Yukine>\F[1]\AA[F]\FF[24]

(There are marks left on the pillar. This era is, let's
see...)\F[5]
(Huh? Could it be that Saku is actually much older than me?)\F[7]
"Saku... It's okay for me to be your Onee-san, right?"\n<Yukine>\F[7]\AA[F]\FF[22]
"It seems like she has something she wants to tell us."\n<Yukine>\F[5]
